A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Pre-movie: 93%? Awesome trailers? This is going to be incredible!
Post-movie: I'm trying to convince myself to like this movie\, but I just can't. The more I think about it\, the more I hate it. 

What I liked: Great fight scenes\, and some incredible visuals. The last 1/2 hour was easily the best part.
What I didn't like: There were so many unnecessary moments and new characters that there wasn't really any development for the original characters I cared most about. I left feeling like nothing significant happened in the film\, and everything that I thought was going to be a big deal (Leia\, Snoke\, Rey's past) ended in a letdown.
